item.title: wayneclub/Subtitle-Downloader
item.description: Auto download subtitles from streaming services, such as Apple TV+, CatchPlay, Crunchyroll, Disney+, FridayVideo, HBO GO Asia, iQIYI, iTunes, KKTV, LINE TV, meWATCH, MyVideo, NowE, NowPlayer, Viki, Viu, WeTV, YouTube, and etc.
